scene_description_enriched: A haloed figure, likely a saint or prophet, stands with arms outstretched and head tilted upwards, gazing at a starry sky. The figure is draped in a flowing robe. In the background, a few buildings with pitched roofs are visible, suggesting a settlement. The foreground is adorned with stylized flowers and foliage. The overall scene evokes a sense of divine contemplation or prophecy, possibly depicting a moment of revelation or prayer under the heavens.
